â€œGreat indica dominate strain, Biker has made into my top 4 that I perpetually keep in stock, I use it for both an late afternoon and evening strain, also will use it right before bed if I don't have a super heavy indica around.
Biker Kush has lightly Piney and slight lemony aroma and the flavor matches exactly. However I am not a fan of lemony flavors, but I will explain why I love this strain and it's not the taste....â€

â€œpicked this one up 2day....it was renamed biker 81 og believe this is the same strain tho if I'm correct not a funky odor of og of that what I'm used to took 3 rips and hit the spot not a KO like it says but something to smoke on until I hit the shop again ;)â€
â€œWas hoping for a good buzz to end the night, but this kind made me feel weird and a little paranoid. it did make me tired but I didn't enjoy the effects.â€
â€œBiker kush...definitely a good one!!! Very good sedative...really relaxes you & while it relaxes you enjoy the great flavor. It tastes like berry-ish, lemony, really kushy & it was awesome =Dâ€
